11411122.content:
A torrent of liquid starts falling from above. This is it, you think. I'm going to die. Some of the liquid splashes onto you, and you brace for the pain.

Nothing happens.

Relaxing slightly, you hear a thud and move over to investigate. You almost panic as a large amount of the liquid lands right on top of you, but it doesn't hurt you. You reach out and feel for whatever Jessica just swallowed. It is slightly larger than you are, round, with a rough surface. She's taken an indigestion tablet. It's no use - you're going to die in this girl's stomach. You collapse, paralysed with fear, and await the inevitable.

The next thing you notice is a sensation of falling. This lasts for only a moment, before you plunge into another liquid. You instantly feel an intense burning sensation - you have never felt this much pain before. Before your brain has time to respond, you let out a desperate scream of agony. How could she do this to someone?

Within moments, the pain started to subside. The acid must have dissolved your nerve endings. At least it won't hurt any more.
As you begin to accept your fate, you suddenly think of something. You lift an arm up and pinch yourself as hard as you can. It hurts. A glimmer of hope flows into you. She swallowed an antacid. Maybe you can survive after all. Holding onto this thought, you begin to relax as you are thrown around by her stomach muscles. The sensation starts to make you feel sick, and you are grateful to finally be pushed out of her stomach. You scramble your way to the surface of the part digested food you are travelling in, and gasp for air. There's very little of it down here, and it takes all your effort just to keep breathing. Descending towards her intestines, the air quality reduces further still, and you eventually pass out.

121.content:
As you run in, many students are pouring in behind you. You try to avoid them, but there is seemingly nowhere to run. Left or right students are streaming in, so you simply run forward as quickly as you can. This room was organized in rows, and each row was a level higher than the previous row, so the feet of one student were near the head of the one in the row below it. You ran onto one of the rows in the middle of the room, and ran to the middle of the row before stopping and taking shelter under one of the desks. Students came in and sat in the desks. You saw a girl coming towards your desk so you moved out in front of the desk. She sat down, her feet dangerously close to you. As you looked forward, you saw the fall from one row of the room to the next. It would be a simple couple steps at normal size, but at this height, the fall would kill you. But when you turned around, you were confronted with the monolithic boots of the girl sitting at the desk.

You actually recognized this girl. Her name is Alyssa. She is a very cute girl, with bright green eyes and slightly longer than shoulder length auburn hair. She has a petite frame. It was around mid-September now, and still pretty warm, so you weren't entirely sure why she was wearing the current UGG boots that stood in front of you. Because you guys had spoken a few times before, you figured she would help you if you could only get her attention.

You decided you would start by climbing her boot, and so you began to approach. Before you even touched it, you started to catch a whiff of a certain odor. It was a bad odor. You looked at her boot and wondered if she stepped on something and it stuck to her shoe. The closer you got, the more you could smell it, and it sure wasn't any outside odor. No, this was the clear odor of a sweaty foot. Her foot actually smelled so bad, that you could smell it from outside her boot. But you wouldn't let this deter you, you had to get her attention, so you continued onwards until you finally reached the tip of her boot. The smell was pretty bad at this point. It was a strong scent of smelly foot, however, it was distinctly feminine. You began to climb the black UGG boot, grabbing on the suede material, and clawing your way up. When you made it to the top, you couldn't believe how much you could smell her foot from just standing next to the entrance. You had to be careful because there were some gaps, just barely big enough for you to slip inside and fall into the boot.

After a few moments, you lunged for the bottom of her jeans to begin climbing them.
